nodes.text: Palhra Wavren was a civilian who was held hostage by Roshu Sune guerrillas when a commuter hopper she was traveling on was hijacked and set down in the swamps outside of Skreeka, on Atzerri, where the Gotal guerrillas had a temporary base. Along with 12 other hostages out of 25, Wavren was rescued by a Jedi task force led by Sarrissa Jeng, although she was injured in the fight, probably by burns or smoke inhalation. Wavren was taken to Talos Port Medicomplex to recover.
